Use this to investigate why a device record looks different from prior audits or to surface detailed history in an admin review screen."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset change detail"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/changes/{assetChangeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the full audit entry for a specific asset change, including the field that changed, before/after values, who made the change, and when it occurred. Use this to investigate why a device record looks different from prior audits or to surface detailed history in an admin review screen.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetChangeId** - Obtain from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/changes/query](/docs/api/assets/query-asset-changes) by filtering for the asset and reading `Items[].AssetChangeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query recent changes: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/changes/query](/docs/api/assets/query-asset-changes) with filters for the asset -&gt; capture `AssetChangeId`.
2. Load the change detail: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/changes/\{assetChangeId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-change) to review the audit payload.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetChangeId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetChangeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the change record","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
